headline: Aristotle Growth Equity Fund Bets on DexCom (DXCM) Due to Its Expanding CGM Market Leadership
summary: Aristotle Funds, an investment advisor, released its “Growth Equity Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. equity markets reached new all-time highs in Q4 2025, with the S&P 500 Index rising 2.66% and the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index increasing by 1.10%. Within the Russell 1000 Growth Index, […]

headline: DexCom Weighs GLP 1 CGM Tailwind Against Valuation And Momentum Signals
summary: DexCom (NasdaqGS:DXCM) is seeing higher adoption of its continuous glucose monitoring systems among patients using GLP-1 drugs, as physicians pair both therapies for diabetes care. The company is refining its product lineup, with management expecting the 15 day G7 CGM system to take a leading role within its portfolio. These developments are material for investors because they relate to DexCom's growth paths across domestic and international CGM markets beyond standard earnings...
